name: astatine
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(symbol At) a chemical element that is radioactive and is the rarest natural element on the Earth's surface: The properties of astatine remain a mystery.
More examplesFewer examplesThe lowest element in this group is also a highly radioactive and rare element, astatine. Fluorine and astatine are halogens.What is the physical state of astatine at room temperature?
